step_data.thought: The previous actions were to enter the 'From' and 'To' locations, switch the travel mode to 'Bicycle (OSRM)', and click the 'Go' button to calculate the bicycle route. The current state of the page shows the calculated route with steps and distances, indicating that the route has been successfully calculated. The 'Directions' section now contains the route from Brooklyn Bridge to Hudson River Park. The user can view this information directly on the page, so no further actions are needed. I will now send a message to the user to inform them that the bicycle route has been calculated and displayed.
step_data.action: stop('The bicycle route from Brooklyn Bridge to Hudson River Park has been calculated and displayed on the page. You can view the route by scrolling through the steps shown below the map.')
